document_data.name: ''Inspired Cocoa Mug''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Legacy Award: Inspired Cocoa Mug}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Inspired cocoa mugs''''' were [[magic item|magical]] drinking vessels that filled themselves up with [[cocoa broth]]. They saw use in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Powers: An ''inspired cocoa mug'' could fill itself up with cocoa broth multiple times a day. This drink had restorative properties, and aided in recouping energy when drank while relaxing.
